page.title: 05Transport Fuel/Servicing.
page.content: {GARAGES AND FILLING STATIONS. {Six filling stations }provide a weekly service from 8 a.m. to 11.30 p.m.{The {Esso Self Service Station }closes at 2 a.m. weekends. {Petrol costs Â£1.90} per gallon. Confectionery,refreshments and cigarettes are sold at some stations. {One station} has a {Fast Food} take-away. {Four} main car dealers operate in this area. {Desmond Motors specialise}in { {Ford} vehicles,{Vehicle Services} deal in {Renault}automobiles, {McLauglin {Motors} are the main {Volkswagen } dealers and {Springcourt Motors} sell{ {Toyota}. Each of these garages has its own {service unit}.Two of the filling stations have a car wash,costing approximately {Â£1.
